title: Representations for ingredients
description: What is the best representation for ingredients?We need to convert ingredeints to numeric values so that computers can do mathematical operations. My question was what the best representation is for this dataset. I compared representations below.  CountVectorizer TfidfVectorizer TfidfVectorizer + SVD Word2Vec fastText TfidfVectorizer + fastText Pre-trained model (Module google/‌nnlm-en-dim128/1)  There is room for tuning parameters.
description_lemmatized: best representation ingredientswe need convert ingredeints numeric value computer mathematical operation question best representation dataset compared representation countvectorizer tfidfvectorizer tfidfvectorizer svd word2vec fasttext tfidfvectorizer fasttext pretrained model module googlennlmendim1281 room tuning parameter
